resources:
PAD Analysis Crosshairs Frame RGB Take Photo Saved RGB Molarity Color Clear Evaluate Add Save Send Email Add: Click on the plus ion on the top bar to add new data points. To add a data point, take a picture and input the molarity of the substance that caused that color. 

Evaluate Sample: Take a new picture and predict the molarity based on linear regression of current data points. 

Save: When clicking 'save', a CSV file is saved to /data/padanalysis. 

Send to email: Send CSV file to email. 

Clear: Clears list of data points.
